H3.text: who is the lead singer of depeche mode. David Gahan

A4.text: David Gahan is an English singer best known as the lead singer of electronic music band Depeche Mode since their formation in 1980.

A5.text: Gahan was ranked at No. 73 on Q magazine's list of the '100 Greatest Singers' and No. 27 on its list of the '100 Greatest Frontmen'.
